51-year-old.context: The patient is a 51-year-old Caucasian female with a history of a nasopharyngeal mass discovered with patient's chief complaint of nasal congestion and chronic ear disease.

nasopharyngeal mass.context: The patient is a 51-year-old Caucasian female with a history of a nasopharyngeal mass discovered with patient's chief complaint of nasal congestion and chronic ear disease.

fiberoptic nasopharyngoscopy.context: The patient had a fiberoptic nasopharyngoscopy performed in the office which demonstrated the mass and confirmed also on CT scan.

CT scan.context: The patient had a fiberoptic nasopharyngoscopy performed in the office which demonstrated the mass and confirmed also on CT scan.

right upper lid skin lesion.context: The patient also has had this right upper lid skin lesion which appears to be a cholesterol granuloma for numerous months.

cholesterol granuloma.context: The patient also has had this right upper lid skin lesion which appears to be a cholesterol granuloma for numerous months.

Functional endoscopic sinus surgery.context: Functional endoscopic sinus surgery, excision of nasopharyngeal mass via endoscopic technique, and excision of right upper lid skin lesion 1 cm in diameter with adjacent tissue transfer closure.

excision of nasopharyngeal mass via endo.context: Functional endoscopic sinus surgery, excision of nasopharyngeal mass via endoscopic technique, and excision of right upper lid skin lesion 1 cm in diameter with adjacent tissue transfer closure.

excision of right upper lid skin lesion.context: Functional endoscopic sinus surgery, excision of nasopharyngeal mass via endoscopic technique, and excision of right upper lid skin lesion 1 cm in diameter with adjacent tissue transfer closure.

Less than 30 cc.context: Estimated Blood Loss: Less than 30 cc.

severely deviated nasal septum.context: There appeared to be a spur on the left inferior aspect and also on the right posterior aspect. The nasopharyngeal mass appeared polypoid in nature almost lymphoid tissue looking. It was then localized with 1% lidocaine with epinephrine 1:100,000 of approximately 3 cc total.

spur.context: There appeared to be a spur on the left inferior aspect and also on the right posterior aspect. The nasopharyngeal mass appeared polypoid in nature almost lymphoid tissue looking. It was then localized with 1% lidocaine with epinephrine 1:100,000 of approximately 3 cc total.

polypoid.context: The nasopharyngeal mass appeared polypoid in nature almost lymphoid tissue looking.

lymphoid tissue.context: The nasopharyngeal mass appeared polypoid in nature almost lymphoid tissue looking.

biopsies.context: Prior to taking down this lesion with the XPS, multiple biopsies were taken with a straight biter.

Keflex.context: The patient will be sent home with a prescription for Keflex 500 mg one p.o. b.i.d, and Tylenol #3 one to two p.o. q.4-6h.
